title: What period has the greatest success in science and technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: This question is tough to answer because there is no single standard against which we can compare the harnessing of fire or the invention of the wheel with the invention of the internet and cell phone. In terms of sheer technical advancement, the modern period would take the prize, but if judged by how ‘advanced’ and invention was for the time in which it happened, I doubt that today’s toys would win.
